name: Akkroo
overview:
Akkroo simplifies data capture, event check-in and registration with it’s mobile application and service.

Collecting thousands of pieces of data (names, emails, question responses) accurately and then acting up on them instantly is pretty much impossible with a paper-based system. Akkroo simplifies many of these tasks with customisable, instantly-validating forms which cuts out transcription, much human error and allows customers to process the data immediately - including sending event welcome emails instantly.

Originally developed to fulfil an in-house need, external organisations quickly expressed an interest in using it for their own purposes after seeing it in use at conferences and events in the UK. Within a year the technology was being licensed for use by a several blue chip companies.

In 2012 and following a ground-up rebuild by a newly-formed, dedicated development team and Akkroo became a stand alone entity with the remit to develop the business in new markets and locales.
